Topic Summary: Surrenders of losses under the group relief provisions/recharge payments and the expenses of management
Tax Legislation: Section 83 & Section 420(3) TCA 1997, Section 56 of the Companies Act 1948, Section 62 & Section 169 of the Companies Act 1963, Section 2(3) of the Companies Act, 1983, , section 64(3)(4) & 71(5) of the Companies Act 2014.
